duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage delivery of projects involving software package implementation and custom development for clients.
Coach and mentor the project team to produce high-quality, on-time, on-budget project deliverables.
Manage project definition, status reporting, quality, staffing, and budget.
Build and manage client relationships, establish policies and procedures.
Support sales efforts of Asset Management related services.
Provide subject matter expertise regarding key decisions related to industry and/or functional area.
Interact directly with clients and travel as required.
